verbs.description: [ARG1: system] [ARG2: shock] [V: remastered] gets mesmerizing alpha footage playable for backers system shock is a 1994 first - person adventure developed by looking glass technologies and origin systems the game is set aboard a space station in a cyberpunk version of 2072 players assume the role of a nameless hacker who attempts looking glass studios system shock nightdive studios looking glass technologies origin systems traverse citadel station stephen kick developer
